name: Fifi Apron- Midnight Snack
description:
<font size="3"This is our favourite, it looks good on everyone! Perfect for every occasion, dress it up or down, an elegant evening dress or jeans and a T-shirt. Long straps so you can tie it at the front or the back.
Cherry Pie Couture products are brilliant gifts for any occasion.
The Flirtatious Apron is meticulously put together with matching binding and ribbons and has a lovely frill at the bottom.

<font size="3"•	100% High Quality Cotton
•	40C-60C Wash, Colours do not run.
•	Made in Spain
•	Dimensions:<font size="3"


<font size="3"Small</font>

<font size="3"Width : 71cm
Height : 78cm
Neck width : 22cm
Neck Strap:  57cm
Back Strap: 100cm</font>

<font size="3"Medium</font>

Width : 75cm
Height : 81cm
Neck width : 25cm
Neck Strap:  59cm
Back Strap: 100cm</font>

name: Mimi Apron- Calaveras Turquoise
description:
<font size="3"This Pinny is not only very useful in it’s own right but it looks fabulous on, it’s fun & quirky. You don’t even need to take it off when guests arrive, just take it off when you finally sit down after all that hard work. We could almost promise you will receive compliments when wearing it.
This cute little apron is our most feminine apron. Perfect for « dinner a deux », tea time with the children or even just for a spot of dusting about the house. Cherry Pie Couture products are brilliant gifts for any occasion.</font>
 
<font size="3"•	One Size fits all
•	100% High Quality Cotton
•	40-60 Degree Wash
•	Made in Spain</font>

<font size="3"Dimensions :
Width : 52cm
Height : 48cm
Waistband width : 3.5cm
Waistband length : 170cm</font>

name: Iron Board Cover-Midnight Snack
description:
<font size="3"
Now we all know that ironing is not the most exciting of chores, but we like to think our covers bring a little fun and colour into it. Having a reflective heat material they are very effective and long lasting. This is a cover you might not even want to hide away in the cupboard. An ironing board cover is not always something you like to buy for yourself, but these may change your mind!</font>

<font size="3"
•      60% High Quality Cotton
•	40% Insulbright
•	40C Wash
•	Made in Spain</font>

<font size="3"Dimensions:
Width: 53cm
Height: 133cm</font>

name: Hot Water Bottle- Home Sewing
description:
<font size="4"
Cherry Pit & Hot Water Bottle Covers:</font>

<font size="3"Cherry Pit:
The Cherry Pit is the natural alternative to a hot water bottle. Place the Cherry pit without it’s fancy cover in the microwave for 2-3 minutes. This is very important as the cover has a metal zip. The cherry pits will sweat the first couple of times before they dry out a little. Hand wash. This method is known to hold heat longer than a hot water bottle! Heat will soothe and comfort stiff joints, sore achy muscles and much more. Enjoy!</font>


<font size="3"Hot Water Bottle:
The Hot Water Bottle & it’s cover is always warming and great for tummy aches and muscular pain. A brilliant gift or sneaky self indulgence. Whether you are in front of a movie or at school feeling homesick this just hits that spot every time.</font>

<font size="3"
•	One Size fits all
•	90% High Quality Cotton
•	10% Molleton 
•	40 Degree Wash, Colours do not run.
•	Hand wash Cherry Pit
•	Made in Spain</font>

<font size="3"
Weight & Dimensions: 
Width : 21cm
Height : 32.5cm
Neck width : 8.5cm
Neck Height: 5cm</font>

name: Butcher-Mirage Garnet
description:
<font size="3"
This apron fits all sizes and it’s super easy to wear. We love men in the kitchen making delicious food, and how great to have a fun and colorful apron on at the same time. Show it off in front of the lads on your lawn whilst cooking up a beast of a barbeque! It’s also great for those dirty odd jobs around the house and garage. Don’t be afraid to rub your hands all over it.<font/>

<font size="3"
•	One Size fits all
•	100% High Quality Cotton
•	40C-60C Wash, Colours do not run.
•	Made in Spain<font/>

<font size="3"Dimensions:<font/>

<font size="3"Width: 88cm
Height: 88cm
Straps: 72cm x 3.5cm
Pockets: 38cm x 18cm & 25.5cm x 12cm<font/>
